verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> prevailed <S%H5810><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H853><s%> the dens <S%H4492><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and caves, <S%H4631><s%> and strongholds. <S%H4679><s%>

And so it was, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H518><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> had sown, <S%H2232><s%> that the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> came up, <S%H5927><s%> and the Amalekites, <S%H6003><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east, <S%H6924><s%> even they came up <S%H5927><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them;

And they encamped <S%H2583><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> them, and destroyed <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> the increase <S%H2981><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> thou come <S%H935><s%> unto Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sustenance <S%H4241><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither sheep, <S%H7716><s%> nor ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor ass. <S%H2543><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> with their cattle <S%H4735><s%> and their tents, <S%H168><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> as <S%H1992><s%> grasshoppers <S%H697><s%> for multitude; <S%H7230><s%> for both they <S%H1992><s%> and their camels <S%H1581><s%> were without <S%H369><s%> number: <S%H4557><s%> and they entered <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> it.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> was greatly <S%H3966><s%> impoverished <S%H1809><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the Midianites; <S%H4080><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> because of <S%H5921><s%> <S%H182><s%> the Midianites, <S%H4080><s%>

That the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I <S%H595><s%> brought you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%>

And I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> you, and drove them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and gave <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> their land; <S%H776><s%>

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto you, I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> land <S%H776><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> dwell: <S%H3427><s%> but ye have not <S%H3808><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

And there came <S%H935><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> an oak <S%H424><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> that <S%H834><s%> pertained unto Joash <S%H3101><s%> the Abi-ezrite: <S%H33><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Gideon <S%H1439><s%> threshed <S%H2251><s%> wheat <S%H2406><s%> by the winepress, <S%H1660><s%> to hide <S%H5127><s%> it from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Midianites. <S%H4080><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> thee, thou mighty man <S%H1368><s%> of valor. <S%H2428><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Oh <S%H994><s%> my Lord, <S%H113><s%> if the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us, why <S%H4100><s%> then is all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> befallen <S%H4672><s%> us? and where <S%H346><s%> be all <S%H3605><s%> his miracles <S%H6381><s%> which <S%H834><s%> our fathers <S%H1><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> us of, saying, <S%H559><s%> Did not <S%H3808><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bring us up <S%H5927><s%> from Egypt? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> but now <S%H6258><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5203><s%> us, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> us into the hands <S%H3709><s%> of the Midianites. <S%H4080><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> him, and said, <S%H559><s%> Go in <S%H1980><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thy might, <S%H3581><s%> and thou shalt save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of the Midianites: <S%H4080><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> I sent <S%H7971><s%> thee?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Oh <S%H994><s%> my Lord, <S%H136><s%> wherewith <S%H4100><s%> shall I save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel? <S%H3478><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> my family <S%H504><s%> is poor <S%H1800><s%> in Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> am the least <S%H6810><s%> in my father's <S%H1><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Surely <S%H3588><s%> I will be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee, and thou shalt smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, If <S%H518><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> then show <S%H6213><s%> me a sign <S%H226><s%> that thou <S%H7945><s%> <S%H859><s%> talkest <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me.

Depart <S%H4185><s%> not <S%H408><s%> hence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, and bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> my present, <S%H4503><s%> and set <S%H5117><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> thee. And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will tarry <S%H3427><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> thou come again. <S%H7725><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> went in, <S%H935><s%> and made ready <S%H6213><s%> a kid, <S%H1423><s%> <S%H5795><s%> and unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of flour: <S%H7058><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> he put <S%H7760><s%> in a basket, <S%H5536><s%> and he put <S%H7760><s%> the broth <S%H4839><s%> in a pot, <S%H6517><s%> and brought it out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him under <S%H413><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the oak, <S%H424><s%> and presented <S%H5066><s%> it.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes, <S%H4682><s%> and lay <S%H5117><s%> them upon <S%H413><s%> this <S%H1975><s%> rock, <S%H5553><s%> and pour out <S%H8210><s%> the broth. <S%H4839><s%> And he did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the staff <S%H4938><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes; <S%H4682><s%> and there rose up <S%H5927><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes. <S%H4682><s%> Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> out of his sight. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5869><s%>

And when Gideon <S%H1439><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Alas, <S%H162><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H413><s%> face. <S%H6440><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Peace <S%H7965><s%> be unto thee; fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%>

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it Jehovah-shalom: <S%H3073><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> it is yet <S%H5750><s%> in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%> of the Abi-ezrites. <S%H33><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy father's <S%H1><s%> young bullock, <S%H6499><s%> <S%H7794><s%> even the second <S%H8145><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, and throw down <S%H2040><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> hath, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> the grove <S%H842><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> it:

And build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> rock, <S%H4581><s%> in the ordered place, <S%H4634><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and offer <S%H5927><s%> a burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%> with the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the grove <S%H842><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt cut down. <S%H3772><s%>

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of his servants, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5650><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him: and so it was, <S%H1961><s%> because <S%H834><s%> he feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> household, <S%H1004><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> that he could not do <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> it by day, <S%H3119><s%> that he did <S%H6213><s%> it by night. <S%H3915><s%>

And when the men <S%H376><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> arose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> was cast down, <S%H5422><s%> and the grove <S%H842><s%> was cut down <S%H3772><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was by <S%H5921><s%> it, and the second <S%H8145><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> was offered <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> that was built. <S%H1129><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing? <S%H1697><s%> And when they inquired <S%H1875><s%> and asked, <S%H1245><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

Then the men <S%H376><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joash, <S%H3101><s%> Bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy son, <S%H1121><s%> that he may die: <S%H4191><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath cast down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal, <S%H1168><s%> and because <S%H3588><s%> he hath cut down <S%H3772><s%> the grove <S%H842><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was by <S%H5921><s%> it.

And Joash <S%H3101><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, Will ye <S%H859><s%> plead <S%H7378><s%> for Baal? <S%H1168><s%> will ye <S%H859><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> him? he that <S%H834><s%> will plead <S%H7378><s%> for him, let him be put to death <S%H4191><s%> whilst <S%H5704><s%> it is yet morning: <S%H1242><s%> if <S%H518><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> be a god, <S%H430><s%> let him plead <S%H7378><s%> for himself, because <S%H3588><s%> one hath cast down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H853><s%> his altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Therefore on that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> him Jerubbaal, <S%H3378><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let Baal <S%H1168><s%> plead <S%H7378><s%> against him, because <S%H3588><s%> he hath thrown down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H853><s%> his altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then all <S%H3605><s%> the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> and the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> and went over, <S%H5674><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

But the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came upon <S%H3847><s%> <S%H853><s%> Gideon, <S%H1439><s%> and he blew <S%H8628><s%> a trumpet; <S%H7782><s%> and Abi-ezer <S%H44><s%> was gathered <S%H2199><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> was gathered <S%H2199><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him: and he sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto Asher, <S%H836><s%> and unto Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and unto Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> and they came up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them.

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H3426><s%> wilt save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by mine hand, <S%H3027><s%> as <S%H834><s%> thou hast said, <S%H1696><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will put <S%H3322><s%> <S%H853><s%> a fleece <S%H1492><s%> of wool <S%H6785><s%> in the floor; <S%H1637><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the fleece <S%H1492><s%> only, <S%H905><s%> and it be dry <S%H2721><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> beside, then shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou wilt save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by mine hand, <S%H3027><s%> as <S%H834><s%> thou hast said. <S%H1696><s%>

And it was <S%H1961><s%> so: <S%H3651><s%> for he rose up early <S%H7925><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> and thrust <S%H2115><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fleece <S%H1492><s%> together, <S%H2115><s%> and wrung <S%H4680><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the fleece, <S%H1492><s%> a bowl <S%H5602><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>

And Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> Let not <S%H408><s%> thine anger <S%H639><s%> be hot <S%H2734><s%> against me and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> but <S%H389><s%> this once: <S%H6471><s%> let me prove, <S%H5254><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> but <S%H7535><s%> this once <S%H6471><s%> with the fleece; <S%H1492><s%> let it now <S%H4994><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> dry <S%H2721><s%> only <S%H905><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the fleece, <S%H1492><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the ground <S%H776><s%> let there be <S%H1961><s%> dew. <S%H2919><s%>
